entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 09:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 30 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.
